    • Method Detail

      • getRestartPolicy

        public java.lang.String getRestartPolicy()
        Returns:
        Restart policy for all containers within the pod. One of Always, OnFailure, Never. Default to Always.

      • setRestartPolicy

        public void setRestartPolicy(java.lang.String restartPolicy)
        Parameters:
        restartPolicy - Restart policy for all containers within the pod. One of Always, OnFailure, Never. Default to Always.

      • getServiceAccountName

        public java.lang.String getServiceAccountName()
        Returns:
        ServiceAccountName is the name of the ServiceAccount to use to run this pod.

      • setServiceAccountName

        public void setServiceAccountName(java.lang.String serviceAccountName)
        Parameters:
        serviceAccountName - ServiceAccountName is the name of the ServiceAccount to use to run this pod.

      • getContainers

        public java.util.List<Container> getContainers()
        Returns:
        List of containers belonging to the pod.

      • setContainers

        public void setContainers(java.util.List<Container> containers)
        Parameters:
        containers - List of containers belonging to the pod.

      • getInitContainers

        public java.util.List<Container> getInitContainers()
        Returns:
        List of initialization containers belonging to the pod.

      • setInitContainers

        public void setInitContainers(java.util.List<Container> initContainers)
        Parameters:
        initContainers - List of initialization containers belonging to the pod.

      • getVolumes

        public java.util.List<Volume> getVolumes()
        Returns:
        List of volumes that can be mounted by containers belonging to the pod.

      • setVolumes

        public void setVolumes(java.util.List<Volume> volumes)
        Parameters:
        volumes - List of volumes that can be mounted by containers belonging to the pod.

      • getImagePullSecrets

        public java.util.List<LocalObjectReference> getImagePullSecrets()
        Returns:
        ImagePullSecrets is an optional list of references to secrets in the same namespace to use for pulling any of the images used by this PodSpec.

      • setImagePullSecrets

        public void setImagePullSecrets(java.util.List<LocalObjectReference> imagePullSecrets)
        Parameters:
        imagePullSecrets - ImagePullSecrets is an optional list of references to secrets in the same namespace to use for pulling any of the images used by this PodSpec.
